name: FvB: Farmer Vs Businessman
description:
Unleash your inner farmer. Try our game.

Made in India 🇮🇳

💪 Witness the farm life

💪 Experience various chase adventures

💪 Be a part of a mystical Sci-Fi world

👨‍🌾 Story Mode:  Genre-defining class struggle-adventure featuring innovative in-game mechanics.

Don’t think twice like a Businessman! Leave your Honest Reviews! PLAY NOW for FREE!
